title.title: 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo

msContents.summary: This xylograph contains the Tibetain translation of the Amarakoṣaṭīkākāmadhenu as preserved in the Derge Kanjur.

msItem.title: 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo
msItem.rubric: ༄༅༅། / rgya gar skad du/ a ma ra ko śaṭī kā kā ma dhe nu nā ma/

text.p:
de nas ataḥ gzhan la phan pa parahita rjes su ston pa anuśāsanas sdig pa rab tu zhi ba dang pāpapraśānta/ bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa bsag pa'i phyir puṇyasambhārasampatsambhārāt bcom ldan 'das bhagavān kun tu bzang po samantabhadra la mchod papūjār brjod ni/gang gi zhes pa la sogs
pa yasya iti ādi ste/ mkhyen pa ni yul gyi dngos po mtha' dag samastavastuviṣaya yongs su mkhyen paparijñāna'o/ /brtse ba dayā ni sdug bsngal duḥkha las yang dag par 'don pa samuddharaṇar bzhed pakāma'o/ de gnyis tad dvaya ni rgya mtsho sindhu dang 'dra baivas rgya mtsho sindhu ste/ sangs rgyas buddha bcom ldan 'das bhagavān de'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba ni rgya mtshojñānadayāsindhu'o/ /'diriha rgya mtsho'i sgrasindhuśabdas gting
med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan agādhādiguṇa mtshungs pa nye bar 'jal basamānopamā'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse bajñānadayās byas pa kṛta de tat ni gting med pa la sogs pa agādhādi can zhes pa iti ste/ byed pa po kartṛ la mang pobahula'o zhes paiti'i bsdu basamāsa'o/ /bya ba karaṇa ni ma 'ongs paanāgata'i don can arthin yin pa'i phyir 'dir atra dgos pa med aprayojana do/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag jñānadayā ni rgya
༅༅། /mtshosindhu'o zhes bshad pa ity ukta ni byed pa po kartṛ sgrub pa pratipatti ste/ de'i tshig mi mngon pa'am yang na guḍhaśabda vā drug pa ṣaṣṭhī 'brel pasambandha'i bsdu basamāsa'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag jñānadayā ni rgya mtsho sindhu lta buivar gyur pa ste/ rgya mtsho sindhu ni gzhi yangs pavipulādhāra'o/ rgya mtsho sindhu ni brtan dṛḍha zhing yangs pavipula'o zhes iti lha deva rnams la rab tu grags prathita so/
gting med pa agādha ni gzhan anya gyis mi rtogs pa anadhigata ste/ gang gi yasya mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtshojñānadayāsindhu'i pha rol pāra zab mo gambhīrya yongs su dpyod mi nus paaparicchedya'o/ /gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das debhagavān'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba jñānadayā shes byajñēya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag samastaviṣaya la khyab pa vyāptis/ gang yang kiṃcit sdug bsngal duḥkha gyi rgya mtsho sāgara gting mtha' med
pa agādha skyabs med panistrāṇa'i 'gro ba prāṇin rnams kyis mngon paprakaṭar khyab vyāpti cing gang ba pūrṇa de dag gang gis mthar thug paparyantar sgrol mokṣa nus pa śakya de lta bur gyur pa tathābhūta gang yin pa de ni sdig medanagha de/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa rāgādidoṣa rnams spangs parahita'o/ /yon tan guṇa ni byams pa dang bzod pa dang nye bar zhi ba la sogs pa maitrīkṣamopaśamādi ste/
gu ṇa bod pa laguṇa amantraṇe'o zhes pa iti ata mtha' can at anta gyi byings dhātu tsur sogs cur ādi kyi lhag ma śeṣa yin te/ tshogs dang bcas pa yongs su ma rdzogs paaparipūrṇar bṛta vṛt byas pas so/ /bod paamantraṇa dang goms paabhyāsa dang bsngags papraśaṃsā'i don artha rnams la zhes paitis e ra tsaer ac'o/ /kye blo ldan bho buddhimān khyed cag rnams kyis bhavadbhiḥ de bstan par bya ba nirdeśatva nyid yin
no zhes rtogs par byaiti pratīyate'o/ /khyad paviśeṣar du 'phags pa ārya don dam pa paramārtha grub pasiddha'i phyir du brtse ba kṛpā dang bloprajñās pha rol tu son papāramitā tshol bar byed pa anveṣate dang mchog gi snying rje la sogs pa paramakāruṇikādi yon tan chen po mahāguṇa de lta buevam ni gzhan la phan pa parahita dang bde ba sukha yang dag par sgrub pasamudāgama la zad pa mi mnga' na kṣaya zhing bsnyel ba mi mnga' baasaṃpramoṣas na
mi zad paakṣaya'o/ /yang na athavā 'khor basamsārar gnas pa sthāna nyid na yang 'di la rga shi mi mnga' baatra ajarāmaras mi zad paakṣaya'o/ /gting med pa agādha ni rgya mtshosindhu'i mthil la mi reg pa nyid atalasparśatva do/ /sdig med anagha kyi yon tan nyid guṇatva rin po che'i 'byung gnas ratnākara su gyur pas na mi zad pa akṣaya ste yongs su gang ba nyid paripūrṇatva do/ /skye bo mtha' dag sakalajana 'bras bu phala la
gzhol banimnar rab tu 'dzud papraviśas na rab tu 'jug papravṛtti'i 'bras buphala ston to/ /dpal dang bdud rtsi'i phyir śriamṛtayoḥ du yang zhes pa iti ni/ 'tshed pa'i phyir du 'gro bar byed pa bzhin du pākāya vrajati evam de'i don nyid tattva la bzhi pacaturthī'i rnam dbyevibhāga'o/ /gang gi yasya yi ge akṣara ni phan tshun sdud pasamāhāretaretara'i tshig pada go / /dpal śrī ni phun sum tshogs pasampat'o/ /bdud
rtsi'i ched du amṛtāya zhes pa iti bcud len gyi phyir rasāyanāt bsten pasevyatām'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho jñānadayāsindhu ni srid pasamsārar bde ba 'dod pasukhaiṣin'i mkhas pa paṇḍita rnams kyis dpal gyi phyir śriye te/ sde tshan gsum trivarga gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir sampattaye dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis mumukṣubhiḥ bdud rtsi'i phyir amṛtāya te thar pa'i ched du mokṣāya bsten par bya ba
nyidsevyatva do zhes paiti'o/ /'dir iha mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho jñānadayāsindhu la sogs pa iti rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa sarvajña sems can thams cad sarvasattva la rgyu med paniṣkaraṇar mchog tu parama mnyes gshin pa'i rang bzhin can vātsalyasvabhāva bcom ldan 'das bhagavān bde bar gshegs pa sugata de nyid sa eva nye bar mtshon par byed paupalakṣitas na/ 'di ni rab tu dngas
pa zhes bya baprasāda iti'i snyan dngags kāvya kyi yon tan guṇa te/ ji skad duyathoktam/ dbyangs can gyi mgul rgyan gyi snyan dngags kyi rgyan sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇakāvyālaṅkāra las/ gang gi don yasya artha ni rab gsal baprākaṭya/ /de ni rab tu dngas paprasādar brjodabhidhīyate/ /dper natad yathā/ 'di ayam shar gyur paudayatis rgya grol mudrābhañjana pad+ma canpadmin rnams rgyas gyur cing/ /ri giri dang nags tshal vana man+dā ra bamandāra'i
me tog puṣpa gzhon nu bāla bzhin/ /ngur ba koka lhan cig mi gnas virahavidhura rab tu bcom zhing vibhindan gnyis gnyis gnyen dvandvabandhu/ /spre'ukapi rab tu khros pa kupitas mkhur tshos kapola 'gram pa zangs mdog tāmra bzhin/ /zhes pa 'dir ity atra mun pa tamas bsal ba vigatas ngur bakoka'i mya ngan bsal śokaharaṇa te/ ngur pa koka pho mo strīpuruṣa mtshan mo tamas lhan cig mi gnas pavirahavidhura yin la/ de la
sogs pa bsal baādi haraṇas/ nyi masūrya'i mtshan nyid lakṣaṇa ma bshad kyang anukto 'pi don artha gyis rab tu gsal bar mtshon par byed pa prakaṭam upalakṣyate bzhin no/ /tshigs su bca pa 'di śloko 'yam bstan bcos la yang śāstre 'pi sbyar viniyujyate te/ 'dir tatra snyan dngags smra ba nyid kavivaktṛtva kyis dang por ādi rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag samastavidyāsthāna la shes pa sbyin pa jñānadāna dang / de'i dpalśrī ni phun sum
tshogs pasampatti'o/ /shes pa sbyin pa nyid jñānadānatva kyis phun sum tshogs pasampatti'i rgyur gyur pahetubhūta'i phyir rgya mtsho sindhu dang 'dra iva bas/ rgya mtsho sindhu ste bstan bcos śāstra so/ /'di ni rgyu'i gzugs can heturūpaka gyi rgyan alaṅkāra te/ ji ltartad yathā/ zab pagāmbhīryas rgya mtsho samudra dang mtshungs tulya zhes pa bzhin itīva no/ /de'i gting med pa nyid agādhatva ni ji skad bshad payathokta'i yon tan dang ldan
paguṇavats mtshungs pa med pa nyid atulyatva do/ /sdug bsngal duḥkha gyis gzir ba bādhyamāna rnams la sdig pa zhes agham iti mngon par brjod abhidhāna de/ sdig med anagha ni yon tan nyid guṇatva dang / bde ba'i rgyusukhahetur nyung ba dang gsal ba nyid la sogs palaghuvispaṣṭatvādi'o/ /bsten pa sevā ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang 'chad pa la sogs paśravaṇacintāvyākhyādis so/ /mi zad pa akṣaya ni yang dag par
༅༅། /rdzogs pa nyid sampūrṇatva do/ /yang na ming gi sgra thams cad sarvanāmaśabda kyi go rims anukrama dang / rtags liṅga gsal baprakāśanar brjod pa'i go rims anukrama kyi tshad do/ /'di ltar tathā hi las karma dang mngon par 'dod pa abhilāṣa dag la de yang dag par rab tu sbyin pasampradāna'o/ /gang yang las karma dang byed pa po kartā dag las aṇaṇ dag go/ /de la 'dir
'dod pa na spyod pakāmāvacāra'i thos paśruta'i don artha gyi go rims nyid anukramatva rgya mtsho'i sgra sindhuśabda ste de ni rtags zhes liṅga iti nges par bstan nirdeśa te/ ming dang rtags rjes su bstan panāmaliṅgānuśāsana'i sgraśabda'i'o/ /dpal śrī ni sde tshan gsum gyi phun sum tshogs patrivargasampatti'o de yang slob dpon byā ḍaācāryavyāḍis/ pal dang dbyangs dang blo yi sde gsum śrīsarasvatīdhītrivarga gyi/ /phun tshogs
'byor pasampattivibhutis mdzes paśobhār gyur rnams la/ /'jigs pa med panirbhīta'i yo byad prakaraṇa gang yin pa'i/ /yon tan guṇa de yang dpal zhes śrīr iti rab tu bshadprakāśita/ /ces gsungs ity uktam so/ /yang na athavā thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid vāṅmayasarvajñalakṣaṇa gang yin pa ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa svārthasampad yin zhing/ /de'i rgyu
can taddhetuka sde tshan gsum gyi rgyu trivargahetu ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa parārthasampad ste/ de gnyis ka tad ubhaya ni dpal śrī lo/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa svaparārthasampad dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs puṇyajñānasambhāra la 'bad pa yatna las thar pa thob pa mokṣa prāpta ni bdud rtsiamṛta'o zhes iti so/
